about.intro1: Welcome to my page, that I created to showcase what I have learned in front-end development while trying to apply it to something new. Can you guess what framework is used to create this site?
me: I was always fascinated with computers and technology. My favorite pasttime was breaking our home computer watch it being fixed and breaking it even more. Eventually I learned to script and program and among other things I learned the basics of 3D modeling.
I programmed in grammar school, high school up until university, won a few competitions (not THAT many).
I like to dabble in everything but mainly enjoy front-end development, dockerization of applications, CI, tests and all basically building a project from the ground up.
Recently I enjoyed a tv series Mr. Robot and then moved to similar themed podcasts: Malicious Life and Darknet Diaries.
page: This page was because I wanted to learn a new FE framework. Do you know which one it is already? Try to find out, I have left a hint on this page
Also as you have probably noticed I played with animations, server side rendering, and many other things.
If you are interested in how I implemented this site, press the Octocat in the top right folder.
